meta.description: Adobe Commerce is a secure partner with Boltic. Your credentials are encrypted & can be removed at any time.

options.label: Attribute Metadata
options.description: Attribute metadata provides information about the attributes of products.

options.label: CMS Block
options.description: CMS Block is a reusable content block that can be used across your site.

options.label: CMS Page
options.description: CMS Page represents individual pages of content on your site.

options.label: Cart
options.description: Cart is the collection of items that a customer intends to purchase.

options.label: Categories
options.description: Categories are the classifications of products in your store.

options.label: Customers
options.description: Customers are the individuals who purchase products from your store.

options.label: Coupons
options.description: Coupons are promotional codes that provide discounts to customers.

options.label: Customer Groups
options.description: Customer Groups are classifications of customers based on shared characteristics.

options.label: Customer Segments
options.description: Customer Segments are groups of customers based on specific criteria.

options.label: Customers Search
options.description: Customers Search allows you to find customers based on various criteria.

options.label: Discounts
options.description: Discounts are special offers applied to products or orders.

options.label: Directory
options.description: Directory provides information about countries, regions, and currencies.

options.label: Inventory
options.description: Inventory refers to the stock levels of your products.

options.label: Invoices
options.description: Invoices are the billing documents issued for orders.

options.label: Orders
options.description: Orders are the transactions made by customers on your store.

options.label: Products
options.description: Products are the items available for sale in your store.

options.label: Shipment
options.description: Shipment represents the delivery details of orders.

options.label: Stock Items
options.description: Stock Items are the individual units of inventory available for sale.

options.label: Store
options.description: Store represents the storefronts or websites in your Adobe Commerce setup.

options.label: Tax Classes
options.description: Tax Classes define the tax categories for products and customers.

options.label: Tax Rates
options.description: Tax Rates specify the percentage of tax applied to transactions.

options.label: Tax Rules
options.description: Tax Rules combine tax rates, classes, and regions to calculate taxes.

options.label: Custom
options.description: Custom allows you to define your own resource.

meta.description: Select the resource you want to work with.
